post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, March 7
post.Content:
Some nice links this week - enjoy! :-)

  • Jens Deters has created a TabPaneDetacher library to allow for tabs in a TabPane to be dragged and detached from the original TabPane, into their own separate windows. Very nice :-)
  • Gerrit Grunwald has posted another Friday Fun Component, a nice circular colour selector component.
  • Tom Schindl has announced that e(fx)clipse 2.3.0 has been released, and it includes a number of very nice improvements. Great work Tom!
  • The Griffon project has announced the release of version 2.6.0 of Griffon.
  • Andres Almiray has announced the release of JSilhouette 0.1.0. JSilhouette provides additional shapes for Java applications.
